title: Australian diary. No. 037
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following newsreel items are featured in this progam: water skiing on the Nepean is a thrilling summer sport; ornaments made from twisted wood and fish scales is an unusual hobby; Australian graziers look to the future at Red Hill - Home of the Herefords.
